title: Fix incorrect country flag question answers

requirements.text: Audit all country flag questions in frontend/src/data/questions.ts to verify that the correctAnswer index (0-3) points to the actual correct country name option in the options array for each flag question

quotes: پرچم کشور ها همه جواباشون اشتباس درستش کن زود

acceptanceCriteria: Every flag question's correctAnswer field matches the index of the option that correctly identifies the country shown in the flag image
All 50+ flag questions have been reviewed and corrected where mismatches exist

requirements.text: Update the backend flagQuestions Map in backend/main.mo to ensure all question indices map to the correct answer indices that align with the corrected frontend question data

quotes: پرچم کشور ها همه جواباشون اشتباس درستش کن زود

acceptanceCriteria: Backend Map entries for flag questions match the corrected frontend correctAnswer values
Answer validation in the game correctly identifies right and wrong answers for all flag questions

constraints: Preserve the existing Question type structure and Map-based answer storage in backend/main.mo
Maintain Persian language for all question text and answer options
Keep all existing flag image URLs intact
nonGoals: Adding new flag questions beyond the existing pool
Changing the game mechanics or timer duration
Modifying other question categories (sports, intelligence, science)
